com.pcloud.sdk

Class DownloadOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcloud.sdk.DownloadOptions

  • public final class DownloadOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    A container for the possible options when creating file links.

    DownloadOptions is a immutable container for the allowed options when creating file links through ApiClient.createFileLink(RemoteFile, DownloadOptions), ApiClient.createFileLink(long, DownloadOptions) or RemoteFile.createFileLink().

    Instances of the class can be created either the create() method or by mutating an existing object by calling newBuilder().

    The DEFAULT instance is pre-configured for the most common usage cases.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  DownloadOptions.Builder
      A builder for configuring and creating new DownloadOptions instances.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static final DownloadOptions DEFAULT
        The default instance of DownloadOptions.
        • The content-type will be determined from the file extension.
        • File name WILL BE included in the link.
        • Download will not be forced.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static DownloadOptions.Builder create()
        Creates new default DownloadOptions.Builder.

        DownloadOptions.Builder can be used to customise API call parameters to get FileLink.

        Returns:
        a new DownloadOptions.Builder instance
